array.string: Start by selecting Sleep Well or Wake Well cycles.
Select a playlist, sound or random. Set timer for how long you want the music to play. Set the starting volume of the music.
Select a playlist, sound or random. Set alarm for when you want the music to play. Set the starting volume of the music.
Press start to being Sleep Journey. Shake to reset.
Create playlist from your music library and access sounds to add as audio for your sleep journey.
